title: Bug 4971: Unexpected Behavior in 'Copy Package'
description: When attempting to copy package 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' in jdt.ui, selecting 'xxx' as the destination.
OB: The resulting copied package is named 'ui'.
EB: The copied package should retain its original name 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open jdt.ui
2. Navigate to package 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'
3. Select 'Copy Package'
4. Choose 'xxx' as the destination
5. Confirm the copy process
